UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Enhancing the stability and therapeutic potential of the antimicrobial peptide Feleucin-K3 against Multidrug-Resistant a. Baumannii through rational utilization of a D-amino acid substitution strategy.
Literature.Author: An Y, Guo X, Yan T, Jia Y, Jiao R, Cai X, Deng B, Bao G, Li Y, Yang W, Wang R, Sun W, Xie J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(MIC=64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=32µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591(MIC=32µg/ml)
